name: api-js
description: API for the Web 2 class at UTFPR (Software Engineering).

scripts.db:migrate: sequelize-cli --config config/database.js --migrations-path migrations --seeders-path seeders --models-path models db:migrate
scripts.db:migrate:undo: sequelize-cli --config config/database.js --migrations-path migrations --seeders-path seeders --models-path models db:migrate:undo
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
